# preventsAutomaticBackgroundingDuringVideoPlayback

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether video playback prevents the system from automatically backgrounding the app.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated var preventsAutomaticBackgroundingDuringVideoPlayback: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], which indicates the system doesn’t automatically background an app while it’s actively playing video. A user may still choose to background an app.

## Preventing sleep and backgrounding

- **preventsDisplaySleepDuringVideoPlayback**: A Boolean value that indicates whether video playback prevents display and device sleep.
